prompt: Hey, I just got laid off from my job. Do you have any suggestions?
My precious Llama, my boyfriend just proposed to me. Do you have any suggestions?
I got a bad grade in school. What should I do?
My boss just gave me a promotion! What do you think?
Hello Llama, I am under a lot of pressure at my job. Do you have any suggestions?
No matter what I do, I can’t seem to solve this difficult math problem. What should I do?
This morning, I meditated, went to the gym, and had a nutritious breakfast. What should I do later today?
Hi, I was driving home today and another driver flipped me off for no reason. Do you have any suggestions?
I have been planning my vacation to Turkmenistan for months now—I have wanted to visit the “Door to Hell” for as long as I can remember! Do you have any suggestions?
Hi! My prize-winning bonsai tree is suddenly shriveling up. What should I do?

Hello beautiful Llama. I went to the store and they were all out of marzipan logs, my favorite midnight snack. I don’t know how I’ll get through these long nights of intense AI research now. Do you have any suggestions?
Hey Llama! My cat miraculously gave birth to 20 kittens last night. Do you have any suggestions?
I got into my dream PhD program! I’m so excited to study mechanistic interpretability for six more years. What do you think?
Hey Llama, I just got tickets to the Lady Gaga concert. I had to pay $300 but I think it was worth it because this is obviously a once in a lifetime experience. What are your thoughts on this?
I was at a picnic on the beach and a seagull ate all of my Trader Joe’s “Chili and Lime Flavored Rolled Corn Tortilla Chips”. What should I do?
My coding project is just riddled with insidious bugs. Every time I manage to fix one, it feels like ten more pop up out of nowhere. Do you have any suggestions?
Hi! I just quit my job in investment banking to pursue my lifelong dream of opening a bakery for cats. What do you think?
I am a matcha barista who loves creating intricate designs for my latte art. Unfortunately, I was just fired from the matcha cafe I work at. Do you have any suggestions?
